featuresSection.heading: Unlocking Commercial Potential Essential Investment Features of Shops in Sector 105 Gurugram
description: The commercial landscape of Sector 105 is designed for profitability and long-term sustainability. Unlike older markets, these new-age commercial complexes integrate modern architecture with strategic placement to maximize customer engagement. We focus on properties that offer a competitive edge in terms of infrastructure and accessibility.

Whether you are looking for a small boutique space or a large anchor tenant unit, the options for a shop for sale in Sector 105 cater to diverse business models. These features ensure that your investment is not just a purchase, but a platform for sustained business growth and exceptional returns on investment ROI.

features.title: High Visibility Corner Shops
features.description: These shops are strategically positioned at cross-sections and entry points of commercial complexes, guaranteeing maximum exposure to passing traffic and pedestrian flow. Corner units traditionally command higher rentals due to their superior branding potential and dual-side access. Investing in high visibility shops in Sector 105 ensures that your business receives continuous attention from the affluent resident base moving into the surrounding residential sectors of Gurugram.

features.title: Double Height Retail Spaces
features.description: Offering flexibility for businesses requiring grand aesthetics or mezzanine floor integration, double-height shops provide an expansive retail experience. This feature is highly sought after by banks, premium brands, and large format showrooms. Purchasing a shop for sale in Sector 105 with double-height ceilings adds instant value and broadens the spectrum of potential high-paying tenants interested in the space.

features.title: Ready to Move Shops
features.description: Minimize waiting time and start generating revenue immediately with our curated selection of ready-to-move-in commercial units. These shops often come with basic fittings and are situated in complexes where occupancy is already high, guaranteeing immediate footfall. Eliminating construction delays makes these assets ideal for investors seeking immediate rental income or businesses needing rapid expansion into the Gurugram market.

features.title: Anchor Store Opportunities
features.description: Acquire large format units suitable for anchor tenants like supermarkets, fitness centers, or multiplexes. Anchor stores drive significant foot traffic to the entire complex, thereby increasing the value and rental rates of surrounding smaller shops. Securing an anchor shop in Sector 105 positions you as a major player in the local retail ecosystem, ensuring long-term stability and high capital gains.

features.title: Food Court Units
features.description: Food and beverage F&B investments offer robust returns given the dense population catchment of Sector 105. Investing in dedicated food court units provides businesses with shared infrastructure, common seating areas, and focused F&B traffic. These spaces are essential for community engagement and offer high stability as dining preferences remain strong even during economic fluctuations in Gurugram.

features.title: Strategic Locational Advantage
features.description: Sector 105 sits directly on the Dwarka Expressway, providing seamless connectivity to Gurgaon and key parts of Gurugram like Cyber City and IGI Airport. This premium location minimizes commute times for customers and suppliers alike. A shop for sale in Sector 105 benefits directly from the immense infrastructure investment transforming the Dwarka Expressway corridor into Gurugram’s next major growth nucleus.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Shops For Sale in Sector 105 Gurugram
faqSection.description: Get detailed answers to common inquiries regarding commercial property investment, legal checks, and potential returns in Sector 105 along the Dwarka Expressway.

faqs.question: What kind of expected rental yields can I anticipate from a shop in Sector 105
faqs.answer: The expected rental yield for a commercial shop in Sector 105 typically ranges between 5% to 8% annually, depending heavily on the shop's location within the complex, its floor level, and the quality of the tenant secured. Ground floor retail shops facing the main road or central plaza generally command the highest rental rates and superior yields. We provide detailed feasibility reports and comparable market analysis for specific properties to give you a precise projection based on current market trends and projected occupancy rates in the immediate vicinity.

faqs.question: Is Sector 105 a RERA registered sector for commercial developments
faqs.answer: Yes, all legitimate and major commercial developments offering shops for sale in Sector 105 are required to be registered under the Haryana Real Estate Regulatory Authority RERA. We only list properties that have valid RERA registration numbers, ensuring transparency, adherence to construction timelines, and legal security for the buyer. We highly recommend verifying the project's RERA status on the official portal before making any commitment, and our team assists with this due diligence process thoroughly.

faqs.question: What are the common sizes available when looking for a shop for sale in Sector 105
faqs.answer: Commercial shops in Sector 105 offer a wide range of sizes to accommodate various retail and service needs. Typical sizes start from small units suitable for kiosks or ATMs, generally around 150 to 250 square feet. Mid-sized retail units are commonly found between 400 and 800 square feet, ideal for clothing stores or cafes. Larger units, including double-height showrooms or anchor spaces, can exceed 1500 square feet. We will match the perfect size to your specific investment or business requirement.

faqs.question: How does the Dwarka Expressway impact the valuation of commercial shops here
faqs.answer: The operationalization and ongoing infrastructure development of the Dwarka Expressway are the primary drivers of commercial property appreciation in Sector 105. The expressway drastically reduces travel time to Gurgaon and improves connectivity across Gurugram, attracting both premium residents and major corporations. This improved accessibility translates directly into higher footfall potential and increased property valuation, making shops in this area premium assets compared to non-expressway facing locations.

faqs.question: Are there financing options available for purchasing commercial property in Sector 105
faqs.answer: Absolutely, most major private and nationalized banks offer dedicated commercial property loans for purchasing a shop for sale in Sector 105 Gurugram. Loan-to-value LTV ratios usually range between 50% to 70% of the property value, depending on the applicant's profile and the project's approvals. Our financial advisory team can connect you with lenders offering the most competitive interest rates and favorable repayment terms tailored specifically for commercial investors.

faqs.question: What are the hidden costs associated with buying a commercial shop in Gurugram
faqs.answer: Beyond the basic sale price, buyers should factor in several costs including Goods and Services Tax GST applicable to under-construction projects, Stamp Duty and Registration charges which are levied by the government, and internal maintenance charges or corpus fund contributions to the commercial society. Our transparency commitment ensures all these associated costs are clearly detailed upfront in your financial breakdown before finalizing the purchase agreement.

faqs.question: What is the timeline for possession of shops currently listed in Sector 105
faqs.answer: The timeline varies significantly between different projects. We offer both ready-to-move RTM shops where possession is immediate, and under-construction shops with expected possession timelines ranging from 6 months to 3 years. Investing in RTM shops offers immediate income, while under-construction properties often provide better price appreciation potential upon completion. We ensure that timelines are RERA-verified before presentation.

faqs.question: Can Non-Resident Indians NRI invest in shops in Sector 105 Gurugram
faqs.answer: Yes, Non-Resident Indians are fully permitted to invest in commercial properties like shops in Sector 105. The process requires specific documentation including a PAN card and relevant foreign exchange regulatory compliance PMLA and FEMA. Funds must be channeled through NRE or NRO accounts. Our dedicated NRI investment cell provides comprehensive support, ensuring full compliance with Indian regulatory requirements for a seamless transaction.

faqs.question: What types of businesses are best suited for the commercial shops in Sector 105
faqs.answer: Given the affluent residential profile of the surrounding area, businesses catering to daily needs, convenience, and luxury services thrive here. Ideal businesses include high-end grocery stores, pharmacies, specialty clinics, fine-dining restaurants, professional services like chartered accountancy firms, and branded fashion outlets. The high density ensures success for essential services and lifestyle retail alike.

faqs.question: What documentation is required to finalize the purchase of a commercial shop
faqs.answer: Standard documentation required includes the Buyer’s PAN Card, Aadhar Card, address proof, and financial documents such as bank statements and income proof for due diligence. For the property itself, we provide copies of the approved building plan, occupation certificate if applicable, title deeds of the land, and the RERA registration certificate. Ensuring all documentation is complete and verified is our top priority for a hassle-free transfer of ownership.
